about_the_game:
This is an asynchronous auto chess game!

Cute little animals fight with each other, dozens of cute characters, 60+ basic cards, 60+ abilities, constantly build to bring out your endless creativity!

Is the rouge-lite mode still unfinished? Don't worry, your final deck will be saved permanently in the Champion Hall of Fame, becoming a unique and instantly playable deck that you created yourself!

Your pet's ultimate combat power depends entirely on strategy and operation!

Showcase your Hall of Fame deck, challenge advanced players on the leaderboard, and share it with friends for championship battles!

Asynchronous online battle, play anytime and anywhere, no need to worry about the countdown, it's easy and fun!

The basic rules are simple and clear, and after getting started, you will constantly feel the depth of it. It's fun and durable!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: 料理乱斗

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cute little animals are beating each other up! Hundreds of creative cards, thousands of strange fighting schools! No more one time's rouge-lite game! Permanently store the deck in the Hall of Champions! Send your deck to defeat your enemies anytime and anywhere!
